pr_title: Gjoranv/bundle loader refactor and unit test

timeline.message:
Extract interface for a bundle installer

.. and add implementations for file acquirer and disk bundles.
- This is a step to allow unit testing of BundleLoader.
Allow setting a custom bundle installer for non-disk bundles.
Add unit test and test helpers for BundleLoader
Simplify code flow by getting obsolete file refs from one place.
Add file reference status to test.
Rename parameters and methods to clarify file refs vs bundles
